title: Several of President Donald Trump's Cabinet nominees and other VIPs leave inauguration
shortDescription: Kash Patel, Howard Lutnick, David Sacks, Michael Whatley and others leave the Capitol.

title: President Trump says he wants FEMA gone
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said he wants to do away with FEMA at a visit in Asheville, North Carolina which was hit hard by Hurricane Helene.

title: Judge orders Jan. 6 convict to avoid Capitol; DOJ fights back
shortDescription: The Justice Department told a judge he can't block Oath Keepers founder Stewart Rhodes from visiting the Capitol after Donald Trump's Jan. 6 clemency.

title: NC flood victims of Helene describe disaster to President Trump
shortDescription: North Carolina residents described harrowing escapes from rising floodwaters from Hurricane Helene as Trump surveyed the disaster and recovery.

title: Who is Pete Hegseth, Trump's pick for defense secretary?
shortDescription: Among President-elect Donald Trump's nominees for top positions in his administration, Pete Hegseth is one of the most controversial to face Senate confirmation hearings.

title: Trump deputizes thousands of agents to arrest immigrants | The Excerpt
shortDescription: Plus: A judge blocked Trump's birthright citizenship order. | Trump orders a crypto working group to draft new regulations. | It's all on The Excerpt.

title: Trump administration removes FDA plan to ban menthol cigarettes
shortDescription: The Trump administrations removed FDA's plan to ban menthol cigarettes. The Biden administration did not finalize the rule amid opposition.

title: President Trump pulls Anthony Fauci's security detail
shortDescription: Dr. Fauci, one of the nationâ€™s top health officials for decades, received death threats during the COVID-19 pandemic. He'll now hire his own security.

title: Lawmakers want to rename these highways after Trump: See states
shortDescription: Kentucky is among one of the states where lawmakers want to rename a road after Trump. He already has roads named for him in at least 3 other states.

title: Trump freed Proud Boys and Oath Keepers leaders. What's next here?
shortDescription: Plus: Los Angeles County's Hughes wildfire forces evacuations. | Analysis of President Trump's executive order on DEI. | It's all on The Excerpt.

title: President Trump criticizes Ukraine war effort
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said Volodymyr Zelenskyy should never have entered a war with Russia in a chat about foreign policy with Sean Hannity.

title: Trump suggests abolishing FEMA while in NC; LA next: Live updates
shortDescription: Donald and Melania Trump are stopping in North Carolina, California and Nevada during the first second term trip. Follow along for live updates.

title: What is the Lumbee Tribe? Trump seeks recognition for NC group
shortDescription: The Lumbee Tribe of North Carolina has for years sought federal recognition, and President Donald Trump is pushing for them to have it.

title: Trump embarks on presidential trip for look at unprecedented damage
shortDescription: President Donald Trump will visit areas devastated by floods in North Carolina and fires in California, as debates rage about recovery and funding.

title: Why Democratic attorneys general sued Trump over birthright citizenship
shortDescription: Democratic attorneys general told USA TODAY they fear Donald Trump's birthright citizenship order will erase funding for children's health care.

title: Gaza ceasefire is finally upon us. Is it all because of Trump?
shortDescription: Both the Trump and Biden administrations have publicly claimed credit for pushing the agreement over the line.

title: Trump knocks Ukraine leader, threatens Russian sanctions in interview
shortDescription: Donald Trump said in an interview with Fox News that Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy "shouldn't have allowed" war in his country to happen.

title: Trump deputizes thousands more to arrest immigrants
shortDescription: The Trump administration authorized U.S. Marshals, DEA and Bureau of Prisons officers to conduct immigration enforcement.

title: Danish politician rebukes President Trump's bid to buy Greenland
shortDescription: Before the European Parliament, a Danish politician tells Trump in no uncertain terms that Greenland is not for sale. Find out what he said.

title: Trump executive order to release secret documents
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has ordered the release of secret documents surrounding the assassinations of several prominent political figures.

title: Trump's Education Department cuts DEI programs and staff
shortDescription: The Education Department says it has placed diversity, equity and inclusion staff on leave and canceled over $2.6 million in DEI-related contracts.
